means: 吐露心事，消除（思想、心灵上的）负担

sentence.Network_en: She needed to unburden herself to somebody.
sentence.Network_cn: 她需要找个人诉诉心里的苦衷。

sentence.Network_en: Some students unburden themselves of emotional problems that faculty members feel ill equipped to handle.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些学生倾诉了教师们无力解决的情感问题。

sentence.Network_en: Somehow he had to unburden his soul to somebody, and it couldn't be to Laura.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管怎样，他需要找个人倾诉一番，而这个人不可能是劳拉。

PerfectNetExp.abs: unbuilding 消磁破坏unburden 卸货unburden 卸去负担
21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(一) - 豆丁网 ... nonstop a. 不停的，不断的 unburden vt. 表白，吐露，倾诉 pack vt. 包装，把…打包.
英语同义词_徒工_新浪博客 ... relieve 缓和,减轻,救济 unburden 卸去负担,发泄,表白 assuage 缓和,减轻.

list.abs: 什么意思_英语unburden在线翻译_有道词典... ... unburden oneself to 向 unburden oneself 吐露心声 unburden of 解除.
He unburdened his small heart of certain apprehensions ., 他吐露了他小小心灵里的一些不安.
He unburdened a horse of its load ., 他卸下马背上的货物.
desperately in need of a little unburdening ., 非常需要摆脱心中的负担.

after he came face to face with his fans , the composure that made him unburden himself with the acquaintances who went along with him just in time , was an extra .他来到后，面对他的球迷，沉着使他表白自己的熟人谁去和他一起的正是时候，是一个额外的。

entry.def: If you unburden yourself or your problems to someone, you tell them about something which you have been secretly worrying about.

example.ex: The Centre became a place where many came to unburden themselves, to talk about their hopes and fears...
example.tran: 该中心已经成了许多人前来倾诉心事、谈论心中希望与忧惧的地方。

example.ex: Somehow he had to unburden his soul to somebody, and it couldn't be to Laura...
example.tran: 不管怎样，他需要找个人倾诉一番，而这个人不可能是劳拉。

means.word_mean: 1. free or relieve (someone) of a burden
2. take the burden off; remove the burden from;

auth_sentence.content: Edith could never unburden herself of such weighty baggage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Edith could never unburden herself of such weighty baggage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Edith could never unburden herself of such weighty baggage.

auth_sentence.content: Who else was there for the students to unburden their souls to?
auth_sentence.res_content: Who else was there for the students to unburden their souls to?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who else was there for the students to unburden their souls to?

auth_sentence.content: Kelly kept pieces of his life in different compartments, and, clearly, he was unable to unburden himself to his wife.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kelly kept pieces of his life in different compartments, and, clearly, he was unable to unburden himself to his wife.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kelly kept pieces of his life in different compartments, and, clearly, he was unable to unburden himself to his wife.

sentences.en: He unburdened a horse of its load.

means.word_mean: 吐露心事, 消除(思想、心灵上的)负担

sentences.en: He unburdened himself of his secret to me.
sentences.cn: 他向我倾诉了心中的秘密。
